#summary Default controls and control configuration for Macifom.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

As of version 0.13, Macifom supports only keyboard input for gameplay. Support for USB gamepads is coming soon.

= Details =

Key Mapping (Controller 1)
  * w - *Up*
  * s - *Down*
  * a - *Left*
  * d - *Right*
  * g - *Select*
  * h - *Start*
  * k - *B*
  * l - *A*
